N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง 1.3 - Operation to and from school

State Regulations
(a) Operation to and from school shall
include driving unaccompanied to and from school as defined in section
1.1
(b) of this

Part provided that such licensee possesses the required documentation of such
school attendance signed by such person's instructor. The documentation shall
include a letter signed by the instructor containing the date of the letter, the licensee's name, date of birth, motorist identification number, the dates
and time of the instruction, education or training and the name, address and
phone number of such instructor for verification by a police officer or
magistrate. (b) Notwithstanding the
provisions of subdivision (a) of this section, documentation requirements shall
not be applicable if such licensee could otherwise operate a motor vehicle at
any time or place without restriction. Notes
